title: Going Forward: Professional Development and Your e‑Portfolio
activities: Created an e‑Portfolio collating learning artefacts from prior units; completed a professional skills matrix evaluating competencies developed throughout the module; engaged with self‑reflection frameworks such as Rolfe et al. (2001).
skills: Strengthened self‑reflection and organisational capabilities through consistent documentation practices; improved ability to map learning outcomes to professional competencies.
impact: Maintaining ongoing reflections throughout each unit supported richer synthesis than relying solely on end‑of‑module retrospection. I believe this is the most effective e‑Portfolio I have created.
references: Rolfe, G., Freshwater, D. and Jasper, M. (2001) Critical Reflection for Nursing and the Helping Professions: A User’s Guide. Basingstoke: Palgrave Macmillan.
